  • Constructor Details

    • Magazine

      public Magazine()
      Constructs a Magazine object with all its attributes initialised to deafult

    • Magazine

      public Magazine(double mainPartWeeklyCost)
      Constructs a Magazine object with the specified main part weekly cost.
      Parameters:
      mainPartWeeklyCost - the weekly cost of the main part of the magazine Precondition: - The mainPartWeeklyCost must be a valid non-negative value. Post-condition: - A Magazine object is created with the specified main part weekly cost. - The magazineSupplements and magazineCustomers lists are initialized.

  • Method Details

    • getMainPartWeeklyCost

      public double getMainPartWeeklyCost()
      Returns the weekly cost of the main part of the magazine.
      Returns:
      the main part weekly cost Precondition: - None Post-condition: - The main part weekly cost is returned.

    • getMagazineSupplement

      public ArrayList<Supplement> getMagazineSupplement()
      Returns the list of magazine supplements.
      Returns:
      the magazine supplements list Precondition: - None Post-condition: - The magazine supplements list is returned.

    • getMagzineCustomers

      public ArrayList<Customer> getMagzineCustomers()
      Returns the list of magazine customers.
      Returns:
      the magazine customers list Precondition: - None Post-condition: - The magazine customers list is returned.

    • setMagazineSupplement

      public void setMagazineSupplement(ArrayList<Supplement> supplementList)
      Sets the list of magazine supplements.
      Parameters:
      supplementList - the list of supplements to be set Precondition: - The supplementList must be a valid non-null value. Post-condition: - The magazine supplements list is set to the specified list of supplements.

    • setMagazineCustomer

      public void setMagazineCustomer(ArrayList<Customer> customerList)
      Sets the list of magazine customers.
      Parameters:
      customerList - the list of customers to be set Precondition: - The customerList must be a valid non-null value. Post-condition: - The magazine customers list is set to the specified list of customers.

    • addMagazineCustomers

      public void addMagazineCustomers(Customer... customers)
      Adds customers to the magazine customers list.
      Parameters:
      customers - the customers to be added Precondition: - The customers must be valid non-null values. Post-condition: - The specified customers are added to the magazine customers list.

    • removeMagazineCustomers

      public void removeMagazineCustomers(Customer... customers)
      Removes customers from the magazine customers list.
      Parameters:
      customers - the customers to be removed Precondition: - The customers must be valid non-null values. Post-condition: - The specified customers are removed from the magazine customers list, if they exist. - If a customer is not found in the list, a message is displayed indicating that the customer was not found.

    • generateWeeklyEmailsForCustomers

      public void generateWeeklyEmailsForCustomers(int week)
      Generates weekly emails for the magazine customers.
      Parameters:
      week - the week number for the email Precondition: - The week must be a valid non-negative value. Post-condition: - Weekly emails are generated for each customer in the magazine customers list. - The generated email text is displayed.

    • displayMagazineDetails

      public void displayMagazineDetails()
      Displays the details of the magazine. Precondition: - None Post-condition: - The magazine details, including the weekly subscription cost and supplement details, are displayed.

    • displayCustomersInMagazine

      public void displayCustomersInMagazine()
      Displays the customers in the magazine. Precondition: - None Post-condition: - The customers in the magazine are displayed, including their names and emails.

    • generateEndOfMonthEmail

      public String generateEndOfMonthEmail()
      Generates the end-of-month email for the magazine customers.
      Returns:
      the end-of-month email content Precondition: - None Post-condition: - The end-of-month email is generated for the magazine customers. - The email content is returned as a string.

    • testrun

      public static void testrun()
      Test method for the Magazine class.

      This method tests the functionality of the Magazine class by creating instances of PayingCustomer, AssociateCustomer, and Magazine objects, setting their properties, and generating the end-of-month email.

      Precondition:
      • None
      Post-condition:
      • The Magazine object is created and tested.
